Package controller

Class PredmetController

java.lang.Object
controller.PredmetController
public class PredmetController
extends java.lang.Object
This class connects the model and view components for the selected subject and calls the methods which are used to modify him.
Author:
Aleksa Papovic

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean dodajPredmet()
    This method implements the action of getting data from the dialog ,creating an instance of the subject and adding that instance to the model of a subject.
    void dodajPredmetuProfesora​(Profesor profesor)
    This method adds subject to the professor
    static PredmetController getInstance()
    This method implements the instance as a singleton(it can only be instanced once).
    boolean izbrisiPredmet​(int index_predmeta)
    This method implements the action of deleting a selected subject from the model.
    boolean izmeniPredmet()
    This method implements the action of getting data from the dialog ,changing the data of a subject and adding those changes model of a subject.
    void pretragaPredmeta​(java.lang.String text)
    This method implements the action of searching for a given text through the searchbar.
    boolean proveriESPB​(java.lang.String brojESPB)
    This method checks if the number of ESPB of a subject is valid.
    boolean proveriIme​(java.lang.String ime)
    This method checks if the name of a subject is valid.
    boolean proveriSifru​(java.lang.String sifra)
    This method checks if the code of a subject is valid.
    boolean uklanjanjeProfesoruSaPredmeta()
    This method removes professor from the subject model

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Method Details

    • getInstance

      public static PredmetController getInstance()
      This method implements the instance as a singleton(it can only be instanced once).
      Returns:
      the given instance

    • dodajPredmet

      public boolean dodajPredmet()
      This method implements the action of getting data from the dialog ,creating an instance of the subject and adding that instance to the model of a subject.
      Returns:
      true or false depending on the success of the method

    • izmeniPredmet

      public boolean izmeniPredmet()
      This method implements the action of getting data from the dialog ,changing the data of a subject and adding those changes model of a subject.
      Returns:
      true or false depending on the success of the method

    • izbrisiPredmet

      public boolean izbrisiPredmet​(int index_predmeta)
      This method implements the action of deleting a selected subject from the model.
      Parameters:
      index_predmeta - the index from the selected table row
      Returns:
      true or false depending on the success of the method

    • proveriIme

      public boolean proveriIme​(java.lang.String ime)
      This method checks if the name of a subject is valid.
      Parameters:
      ime - the name of the subject
      Returns:
      true or false depending on the validity of the name of a subject

    • proveriSifru

      public boolean proveriSifru​(java.lang.String sifra)
      This method checks if the code of a subject is valid.
      Parameters:
      sifra - the code of the subject
      Returns:
      true or false depending on the validity of the code of a subject

    • proveriESPB

      public boolean proveriESPB​(java.lang.String brojESPB)
      This method checks if the number of ESPB of a subject is valid.
      Parameters:
      brojESPB - the ESPB of the subject
      Returns:
      true or false depending on the validity of the number of ESPB

    • pretragaPredmeta

      public void pretragaPredmeta​(java.lang.String text)
      This method implements the action of searching for a given text through the searchbar.
      Parameters:
      text - text forwarded through the searchbar

    • dodajPredmetuProfesora

      public void dodajPredmetuProfesora​(Profesor profesor)
      This method adds subject to the professor
      Parameters:
      profesor - selected professor

    • uklanjanjeProfesoruSaPredmeta

      public boolean uklanjanjeProfesoruSaPredmeta()
      This method removes professor from the subject model
      Returns:
      true if that subject has selected professor or false if is null
